title: An Act relative to newborn infant safe sleep practices

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Crighton, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1492) of Brendan P. Crighton for legislation to provide written materials on safe sleep practices at the time of infant’s discharge from the hospital.  Public Health.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Health
Hearing scheduled for 07/14/2025 from 01:00 PM-05:00 PM in A-1
